name: EditSecuritySignalIncidents
description:
Modify incidents linked to a security signal.

This tool allows for updating the incidents related to a specific security monitoring signal. Use it when you need to change how a security signal is associated with incidents.

parameters.name: signal_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the security signal to modify.

parameters.name: incident_ids
parameters.description: An array of incident IDs to associate with the security signal.

value_schema.description: Array of incidents that are associated with this signal.

parameters.name: signal_version
parameters.description: Version of the updated signal. Ensure the client-side version is not lower than the server-side version to avoid rejection.

value_schema.description: Version of the updated signal. If server side version is higher, update will be rejected.
